Data Fields

host_dma_desc_sts_t status

uint32_t buf
 DMA Descriptor data buffer pointer.

Detailed Description

Host-mode DMA Descriptor structure.

DMA Descriptor structure contains two quadlets: Status quadlet and Data buffer pointer.
